"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H376><s%> 'When any man <S%H376><s%> has a discharge <S%H2100><s%> from his body, <S%H1320><s%> because of his discharge <S%H2100><s%> he is unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

<S%H4904><s%>"'Every bed whereon he who has the discharge <S%H2100><s%> lies <S%H7901><s%> shall be unclean; <S%H2930><s%> and everything <S%H3627><s%> he sits <S%H3427><s%> on shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

<S%H5060><s%>"'He who touches the body <S%H1320><s%> of him who has the discharge <S%H2100><s%> shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and bathe <S%H3526><s%> himself in water, <S%H4325><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

<S%H2100><s%>"'If he who has the discharge spits <S%H7556><s%> on him who is clean, <S%H2889><s%> then he shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and bathe <S%H3526><s%> himself in water, <S%H4325><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

Whoever touches <S%H5060><s%> anything that was under him shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%> He who carries <S%H5375><s%> those things shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and bathe <S%H3526><s%> himself in water, <S%H4325><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

<S%H2100><s%>"'Whoever he who has the discharge touches, <S%H5060><s%> without having rinsed <S%H7857><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> in water, <S%H4325><s%> he shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and bathe <S%H3526><s%> himself in water, <S%H4325><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

<S%H3627><s%>"'The earthen vessel, which he who has the discharge <S%H2100><s%> touches, <S%H5060><s%> shall be broken; <S%H7665><s%> and every vessel <S%H3627><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> shall be rinsed <S%H7857><s%> in water. <S%H4325><s%>

<S%H2100><s%>"'When he who has a discharge is cleansed <S%H2891><s%> of his discharge, <S%H2100><s%> then he shall count <S%H5608><s%> to himself seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> for his cleansing, <S%H2893><s%> and wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes; <S%H899><s%> and he shall bathe <S%H3526><s%> his flesh <S%H1320><s%> in running <S%H2416><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> and shall be clean. <S%H2891><s%>

<S%H8066><s%>"'On the eighth day <S%H3117><s%> he shall take <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> turtledoves, <S%H8449><s%> or two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons, <S%H3123><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> them to the priest: <S%H3548><s%>

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> them, <S%H259><s%> the one for a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> for a burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%> The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for him before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for his discharge. <S%H2101><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If any man has <S%H3318><s%> an emission <S%H7902><s%> of semen, <S%H2233><s%> then he shall bathe <S%H7364><s%> all his flesh <S%H1320><s%> in water, <S%H4325><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

<S%H802><s%>"'If a woman has a discharge, <S%H2100><s%> and her discharge <S%H2100><s%> in her flesh <S%H1320><s%> is blood, <S%H1818><s%> she shall be in her impurity <S%H5079><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> and whoever touches <S%H5060><s%> her shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>
<S%H7901><s%>"'Everything that she lies on in her impurity <S%H5079><s%> shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%> Everything also that she sits <S%H3427><s%> on shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

Whoever touches <S%H5060><s%> her bed <S%H4904><s%> shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and bathe <S%H3526><s%> himself in water, <S%H4325><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

Whoever touches <S%H5060><s%> anything <S%H3627><s%> that she sits <S%H3427><s%> on shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and bathe <S%H3526><s%> himself in water, <S%H4325><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>
If it is on the bed, <S%H4904><s%> or on anything <S%H3627><s%> whereon she sits, <S%H3427><s%> when he touches <S%H5060><s%> it, <S%H2930><s%> he shall be unclean until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If any man lies <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H7901><s%> her, <S%H5079><s%> and her monthly flow is on him, <S%H2930><s%> he shall be unclean seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and every bed <S%H4904><s%> whereon he lies <S%H7901><s%> shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

<S%H802><s%>"'If a woman has <S%H2100><s%> a discharge <S%H2101><s%> of her blood <S%H1818><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of her period, <S%H5079><s%> or if she has a discharge <S%H2100><s%> beyond the time <S%H5921><s%> of her period; <S%H5079><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the discharge <S%H2101><s%> of her uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> shall be as in the days <S%H3117><s%> of her period: <S%H5079><s%> she is unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

Every bed <S%H4904><s%> whereon she lies <S%H7901><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of her discharge <S%H2101><s%> shall be to her as the bed <S%H4904><s%> of her period: <S%H5079><s%> and everything <S%H3627><s%> whereon she sits <S%H3427><s%> shall be unclean, <S%H2931><s%> as the uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> of her period. <S%H5079><s%>

<S%H2891><s%>"'But if she is cleansed of her discharge, <S%H2101><s%> then she shall count <S%H5608><s%> to herself seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> that she shall be clean. <S%H2891><s%>

On the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> she shall take <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> turtledoves, <S%H8449><s%> or two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons, <S%H3123><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> them to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

<S%H5144><s%>"'Thus you shall separate the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from their uncleanness, <S%H2932><s%> so they will not die <S%H4191><s%> in their uncleanness, <S%H2932><s%> when they defile <S%H2930><s%> my tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> that is in their midst. <S%H8432><s%>'"
This is the law <S%H8451><s%> of him who has a discharge, <S%H2100><s%> and of him who has an emission <S%H3318><s%> of semen, <S%H2233><s%> so that he is unclean thereby; <S%H2930><s%>
